About The RoleOur client, a US-based company, is looking for a QA Automation Engineer to join their team for a short-term project of 3 months. This role requires strong expertise in test automation, cloud-based testing environments, and collaboration with developers to build a reliable test pyramid.ResponsibilitiesDesign and implement test strategies, including risk assessment. Work with modern test automation tools (WebDriverIO, Selenium, Cucumber-js, Appium, Cypress, TestCafe, etc.). Build and maintain automated test suites in pipelines. Perform API testing and write E2E integration tests (Playwright, Supertest/Jest). Collaborate closely with developers to ensure coverage of the test pyramid. Work with cloud devices and browser providers. Configure and troubleshoot CI/CD pipelines and generate test reports. Apply version control best practices (Git or similar). RequirementsProven experience in QA automation within Agile environments. Hands-on experience with test automation frameworks and API libraries. Strong understanding of building tests from unit level upward (test pyramid). Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and modern development workflows. Strong English communication skills. ‚ú® Benefitsüè° 100% Remote Worküí∞ Payments in USDüåé Work with an international team and clientsüóìÔ∏è Contract duration: 3 months only (temporary role)üåé Location: LATAM (Remote)
